hero.title:
Your Documents.
Your Privacy.
Your AI Assistant.
hero.subtitle: LocalPDF is a privacy-first AI toolkit for PDF documents. Chat with your PDFs, extract key insights, and summarize documents - all running 100% on your device. No cloud. No uploads. No compromises.

manifesto.block1_p1: Every AI PDF tool today requires you to upload your documents to corporate servers. Contracts, medical records, financial statements, confidential reports - all sent to the cloud, stored indefinitely, and potentially used to train AI models.
manifesto.block1_p2: This is not just a privacy concern. It is a professional liability. Your documents should stay under your control.
manifesto.belief1_desc: Your contracts, reports, and records deserve the same protection as your most confidential conversations.
manifesto.belief2_desc: Powerful document analysis tools should not cost $30-100/month. Everyone deserves access to AI capabilities.
manifesto.belief3_desc: Modern computers are powerful enough to run sophisticated AI document analysis locally.
manifesto.belief4_desc: Every line of code will be public. Audit it. Verify that your documents truly never leave your device.
manifesto.commitment1_desc: LocalPDF will always be free. No trials. No premium tiers. Full functionality for everyone.
manifesto.commitment2_desc: Your documents never leave your device. No uploads. No telemetry. No analytics.
manifesto.commitment3_desc: MIT licensed. Fork it. Modify it. Build on it. The mission is bigger than any single project.
